name: Recharge (efair)
description:
It is the distant future. You are an abandoned cell phone. Your memory has been erased. Your battery is low. What exactly is going on here?

Run, throw, climb, and platform through the ghost city. Can you discover what happened to humanity? Who did you belong to, and what was your purpose?

Expand your battery and earn other upgrades to help you get around this electric city, which is dying fast. Find collectibles, gather information disks, and more! And above all else...
Stay charged out there!
